title: CPP Pricing Option
description: Cost Per Point (Gross Rating Point) pricing for TV and audio campaigns requiring demographic measurement

pricing_option_id.description: Unique identifier for this pricing option within the product (e.g., 'cpp_usd_p18-49')

is_fixed.description: Whether this is a fixed rate (true) or auction-based (false)

price_guidance.description: Pricing guidance for auction-based pricing (required if is_fixed is false)

floor.description: Minimum bid price - publisher will reject bids under this value

parameters.description: CPP-specific parameters for demographic targeting and GRP requirements

demographic.description: Target demographic in Nielsen format: P/M/W/A/C + age range. Examples: P18-49 (Persons 18-49), M25-54 (Men 25-54), W35+ (Women 35+), A18-34 (Adults 18-34), C2-11 (Children 2-11)

min_points.description: Minimum GRPs/TRPs required for this pricing option

min_spend_per_package.description: Minimum spend requirement per package using this pricing option, in the specified currency
